Name: The Repairing Mantis
About the game: You experience the surreal nightmare of an insect. A squirrel tries to fly. An alligator is going through an existential crisis. A bridge made of flesh is broken. This bridge eats squirrel’s parts. This surreal universe can turn out disturbingly relatable. It’s a dark existential experience that can be interpreted in many ways. As a praying mantis, you explore an eerie world, meet animals, collect dreams, and make impactful decisions. Features : - Playtime of about 1h - Exploration game with casual mechanics - Interactive story with 2 different endings - Disturbing, violent, and poetic story - Meet depressing squirrels - Play as a praying mantis What players say : - “it's so aesthetically and tonally unsettling” - “When the credits roll you will be thinking about the game, and yourself, and if you should have done it differently” - “It's a unique, creative, and well done dive into a mind in crisis”
